text: Ahmad Akbari Javid (; born 10 February 1947) is an Iranian fencer. He competed in the individual and team foil and team sabre events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Iran Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Iran Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Iran Category:Asian Games medalists in fencing Category:Fencers at the 1974 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1974 Asian Games
title: Ahmad Akbari
